product_name: The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The versatile women's Alpine Project Hybrid Hoodie from The North Face is a stretchy soft shell for climbing that keeps you protected with GORE-TEX(R) WINDSTOPPER(R). GORE-TEX WINDSTOPPER 3-layer nylon/polyester in body is fully windproof and provides a wide comfort range. Hood and side panels are made of nylon/spandex soft-shell fabric that breathes well and reduces bulk. Entire garment features a durable water repellent finish. Fully adjustable hood has hidden cord locks and laminated brim. Harness- and pack-friendly alpine handwarmer pockets. Hidden adjustable hem cord seals in warmth. The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid Hoodie for women is from the TNF Summit Series, tested by athletes for harsh weather conditions.
short_description: The versatile women's Alpine Project Hybrid Hoodie from The North Face is a stretchy soft shell for climbing that keeps you protected with GORE-TEX(R) WINDSTOPPER(R).
